mean_cn: adj. 效率高的；能胜任的
mean_en: doing something well and thoroughly with no waste of time, money or energy
sentence: The mother is very efficient; she can watch her kids and do her work at the same time.
sentence_trans: 这位母亲效率非常高，她可以一边照看孩子一边做自己的工作。
word_etyma: ef出 + fici做 + ent……的 → 能做出事来 → efficient做事有效的
